Text:
Even if the program is not compatible with the Windows 7 then you can try to run the program with the Windows Compatibility Mode for that you have to go through the below given step that will help you for same. Just go through. 

Right click on Program
Click on Properties
Click on Compatibility tab
Select âRun this program in compatibility mode forâ
Select the compatibility (Vista or XP)
Click on Apply
Click on OK
